title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
OB: When filtering a table using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in the filter condition, an error message is thrown on the report page. The error message states: There are error(s) in Table: table8 Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)) detail: An error occurred in data type conversion. Cannot convert it to Date. Cannot convert it to Date.
EB: Save and preview the report. The expected result is that the filter works without any errors being thrown.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column. 2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column. 3. In the value1 field of the filter, input the value new Date("..."). For example, input new Date("3/2/2005").
